caption.p: Differential scanning calorimetry (DSC)-thermogravimetry (TG)-mass spectrum (MS)-FTIR characterization diagrams. ( a) The TG/DSC spectra of NGO; ( b) the MS intensity spectra of gas fragments with m/ z as 18(H 2O +), 28(CO +), 30(NO +), 44(N 2O + or CO 2 +), 46(NO 2 +) and 47(HNO 2 +). IR spectra in the range of characteristic wavelength shown on the top.
